__e: Norah, I've got something strange to tell you. You've been so good to me, it only makes it harder.
Norah, how would you like to do something for me?
Nora had told no one about the phone call.
Nora, I ain't much at apologizing, but I want you to know I could cut my tongue out for all the things I've ever said to you.
You know as well as I do that Nora isn't herself.
Nora and her husband are coming tonight.
She is my daughter-in-law, and she is my daughter.
I have come to set man at variance with his father and the daughter with her mother. A man's enemies will be the people of his own house.
So Nora's making money for the family, eh?
So, if I'm a crook and Nora's father's an honest man... why should I give him a share of any crooked deal I put over?
[Laughing] I want us to do something for her.
What a nice piece of daughter-in-law you got!
Cola's daughter-in-law told me about it.
But you are to be pitied, of course.
She's my beloved and the daughter-in-law of your family.
